title: What is the sequence of chapters of math class 11 should I follow for IIT JEE preparation? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think you should start with basic mathematical chapters like 1—linear inequalities 2-logarithms These may be basic but they are really worth asking in JEE . Now here starts the main jee stream 1—-Sets,Relations and Functions 2—Quadratic Equations 3—Trigonometry(excluding inverse trigonometric functions) 4— Binomial Theorem 5—-Sequence and Series 6—-Permutations and Combinations 7—Straight Lines 8—Circles 9—CONIC SECTIONS 10—Complex Numbers NOW ONLY FEW CHAPTERS ARE LEFT WHICH CAN BE DONE AT ANY TIME BUT I WILL SHARE WITH YOU THE SEQUENCE IN MY COACHING Probability- The whole probability was taught in class 12th (so here you have to manage in 11th) Statistics- It isn't in JEE Advanced course so just few notes were given and was completed in 2 lectures.(it was taught at last in 11th itself) Solution of triangles- Pretty tricky questions may be asked .It was taught after trigonometry. Introduction to 3-D geometry- It was taught before start of straight lines. But no need to worry as it will be taught in 12th in detail PS- THIS WAS THE SEQUENCE WHICH MY COACHING INSTITUTE FOLLOWED. AND IT'S A RENOWNED ONE. (Just below ALLEN). Now you can guess easily. Pls do UPOVOTE and share if you liked the answer.
